comment: It is easy for the most part but his lectures are extremely boring. It is so hard to pay attention. Very nice guy the content isn't that difficult.

The material was super boring and hard to focus on. Attendance was “mandatory” through a location app, but I barely went, and it didn't hurt my grade. Tests were on lockdown, but quizzes were online without it. I struggled with the content more than the professor himself. Not much personality to him, but a nice guy.

He is such an amazing teacher. I've always struggled to understand math—especially statistics but this class changed that for me. His teaching style made the material clear, approachable, and even enjoyable, which is something I never thought I'd say about a math class. I would recommend him to anyone!!

honestly such a 10/10. gives extra credit quizzes that are worth a good bit of points. two attempts on quizzes. aleks isn't too hard and doesn't take too long. hes honestly really chill and easy going and is willing to help you!!!! its so hard to fail his course would def recommend him
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Lots of homework but gives extensions when needed. He is passionate about his work and is very knowledgeable. Lectures can get boring, but he tries to answer any questions. Only tests have lockdown browser + camera. Two attempts on quizzes (no lockdown) plus practice quizzes are extra credit. It's hard to fail.

I have always struggled with all maths and I've kept an A+ in this class. Baggs is very clear with his lectures, good with questions, and makes everything as simple as can be. If you go to class and pay attention, its an easy A, coming from someone who failed algebra last semester. And if you do the practice quizzes, he counts them as extra credit

I have struggled immensely in every math class I have ever taken, and I got an A. I found his PowerPoints to be really informative and well laid out and he is willing to answer questions. Work on ALEX will help. Good nice guy
Great professor, and very easy to understand. All homework is done in ALEKS and is not very long. I maybe spent 3 hours a week on this class. Easy A if you try.

Was never a math person prior! Quizzes & homework count for very little. Lowest quiz dropped. Tests are huge chunk of grade. Lots of extra credit, curves on the test. Final exam replaces lowest test grade but did not need at end. Lectures were helpful but I taught myself through YouTube. Attendance is only 5% of grade. Do the practice quizzes!

I personally didn't learn well with him, so I had to teach myself everything. The first test I got a C, but the next two I got high A's. I have yet to take the final, so I am not totally certain my grade. However, he does lecture, taking notes is hard. He does want you to do well. So I would take him again, just be prepared to relearn later on.
Mr Baggs is an amazing teacher. He gives has set office hours and gives bonus points on tests. He's patient with you when you ask questions. 10/10, loved him!
He's very nice and explains everything in a simplified manner.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Take Him!!!!! I cannot stress this enough!!! he is a nice and caring proffesor. All you have to do is read the lecture slides carefully, bring a Ti 84 calculator and study the practice quizzes before taking the tests or quizzes. Attendance is 5% of your final exam, so be sure to come to class.

absolutely loved this guy. went out of his way to give one on one time to anyone who needed it. you have to show him you care about the class. he really helped me actually learn. i felt comfortable asking questions. very approachable great professor. if you're on the wait list. its worth it
Don't pick him plan and simple worse teacher ever.

First time teaching this class, he did good. No tests but this class is def a lot of work,and you HAVE to come to class to succeed, esp. if you are not tech savvy. Quizzes are easy; he provides sessions where you can come in and get extra help. Take w him because he is lenient with grading and will push back due dates if he sees class is struggling
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: hes a great teacher! very kind to everyone.

Test doesn't have a camera so do with that what you will. As long as you take notes (he uploads everything to d2l so u don't have to go to class) you'll be fine. But he does offer extra credit for attendance.

Gives amazing lectures and explains the content very thoroughly. If you pay attention in his class, you'll almost certainly understand everything. Extra credit for attendance too. If you don't attend, you'll struggle heavily.

Dr. Baggs is one of the best professors I've had. He really wants you to learn and helps you in every way possible, definitely recommend taking him for this course. The course is a little challenging but the way he teaches, everything becomes super easy. Just be careful about the deadlines! If you miss them, you lose the grade.

Elementary stat was really hard for me as I am not a math gifted student. Tons of homework through ALEKS that was fairly easy but then the quizzes and exams came around and were 10x harder than the hw. Loved how it was online and multiple tries. Just hard content to follow

I wouldn't take this class again. This class had a lot of homework. I only learned the material by doing the homework. He also goes really fast so that you don't have any time to make your notes in class. The only thing that I liked about his class was that the quizzes and tests were online with no camera.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Lots of homework

comment: lectures were a bit boring given the subject but he really wants you to learn. GET THE TI-84! There are regular quizzes tests and reviews and plenty of opportunities for extra credit. I skipped class a bit and was able to use the guided hw to teach myself. I surprisingly passed with a 96! you DO have to KNOW the material to pass so put in the work.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: I had James for elementary stats and he didnt follow his own syllabus. He says attendance was a bonus but added a 0 for attendance onto the grade book when it was a BONUS not mandatory as stated on the syllabus. He didnt replace my lowest test score with my final exam grade.

Professor Baggs care's about the success of his students. He is always willing to help, during and after class. His lectures are really understanding and his tests are not too difficult, as long as you know the material. Homework on ALEKS, but you get unlimited attempts. He takes attendance on random days. Definitely recommend Professor Baggs!!

Professor Baggs was one of the best professors I have taken at KSU. He is very understanding regarding almost everything and his class is extremely easy if you attend the lectures. Emphasis on attending lectures however as I did not and that is the reason I ended with a B+

When it comes to this class, it may seem easy and straightforward at first. As the semester continues on, the class itself becomes a lot harder. When it comes to the quizzes, they really do not have anything to do with the homework, and they are things that people do not remember learning in class.
Teaches you what you need to know Everything is done with the calculator! Best professor at KSU!

Professor Baggs is one of the best professors I have taken at KSU. He is very nice and accessible at almost any point of the day besides after midnight. Simply going to class will ensure you get a good grade as he perfectly explains how to do everything in the chapter and will answer questions if there is any confusion. 10/10 would take again.

Fall semester 2021- Personally, statistics itself isn't a very interesting topic so don't expect interesting lectures. When it comes to teaching, he goes through the content pretty fast but is willing to explain things if you stop him and ask questions. Homework is on ALEKS and you have infinite tries on problems which is nice. Get a TI-84 it helps
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Hard class and he only does problems and doesnt explain well.
This class is a must take if youre not good at math.

The class can be difficult especially the last unit but this professor is amazing. He allows you to take quizzes and test 2x and lets you use a notecard. His test are on lockdown browser but camera is not required. He is very good at what he does and as long as you do the work you should pass.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: Personally, I was super nervous to take Statistics. Math just is not my subject and I have always struggled. However, Professors Baggs made it a breeze. He is very knowledgeable and nice. It helped me tremendously to actually attend his class. Don't skip! He gives special advice in his face-to-face sessions. Also, He gives extra credit. Take him!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: This professor is genuinely the best. 10/10 I would take his class again if I could. This class is not hard. Literally such an easy A

Im going to be honest I found my self teaching my self most of the material I blame covid for that though. Theres is tons of homework to use for practice and a boost to your grade. As well as a lot of extra bonus videos. Hes reasonable and gives everything with time. As long as you keep up with lectures youll be good!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: Dr. Baggs is very chill. 3 tests (can use a notecard on all) and lots of homework and online quizzes (can use notes) to boost grade. Skipped class multiple times and still made a 99. Super easy, and he also cares a lot about his students. A must take for those who aren't great at math.

Easiest math class ever. Come to most classes youll get an A and probably be able to skip the final. You dont really need to study as long as you bring a 3x5 notecard for each test and do the homework.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy

comment: Literally one of the easiest classes I've ever taken. He lets us use a 3x5 card on every test also the final. He does do random attendance checks but other than that he's a very good professor. He has dry humor, but if you do the online assignments and use that 3x5 you're guaranteed an A. Loved his class !
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Baggs wants his students to understand the material, & is willing to stay before & after class to help. Show all your work on quizzes and tests, as he gives partial credit even if your answer is wrong. He does allow one notecard for quizzes and tests. If you do the online homework and complete the study guides, you will do just fine.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Dr. Baggs is an amazing Stat teacher. He lectures every day, but makes class interesting and is willing to help you with any questions that you may have. There are 7 quizzes (lowest grade dropped) and 3 tests. You can use a 3x5 notecard on all tests and quizzes. This class is an easy A if you go to class and pay attention. Would recommend.
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria--LECTURE HEAVY
